Description: All corporate-owned Windows PCs of any management type
Corporate Windows devices managed by Intune
Devices with autogenerated DESKTOP or LAPTOP name. Used to target an Intune policy that renames the device to its serial number

MembershipRule: (device.accountEnabled -eq true) and (device.deviceOwnership -startsWith "Company") and (device.deviceOSType -startsWith "Windows") and ((device.deviceOSVersion -startsWith "10.0.18363") or (device.deviceOSVersion -startsWith "10.0.18362") or (device.deviceOSVersion -startsWith "10.0.17763") or (device.deviceOSVersion -startsWith "10.0.17134") or (device.deviceOSVersion -startsWith "10.0.16299") or (device.deviceOSVersion -startsWith "10.0.15063") or (device.deviceOSVersion -startsWith "10.0.14393"))
Description: Windows 10 devices that Windows 10 1909 or below
